data.title: Mastercard reports $8.6 billion in Q3 net revenue, up 17% year‑over‑year
data.description:
Mastercard on Thursday reported that it recorded $8. 6 billion in net revenue last quarter, up by 17% from the same quarter last year, according to the company’s earnings report. The payments giant said the growth came from strong card spending across consumers and businesses, along with expanded services beyond payments. Net income reached $3. 9 billion, […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/mastercard-reports-8-6-billion-in-q3/

data.title: The "whale" with a 100% win rate since October 11th has accumulated over $11.46 million in unrealized losses on its long positions in BTC, ETH, and SOL.
data.description: Hyperbot data shows that the "100% win rate whale since 10.11" has suffered a total unrealized loss of over $11.46 million on its long positions in BTC, ETH, and SOL, specifically: $2.33 million on BTC long positions; $2.16 million on ETH long positions; and $6.97 million on SOL long positions.

data.title: Machi Big Brother's long positions in ETH, HYPE, and PUMP were partially liquidated.
data.description: According to Onchain Lens monitoring, during the market downturn, Machi Big Brother's long positions in ETH, HYPE, and PUMP were partially liquidated, and his ETH long positions are currently down $470,000.

data.title: Bitcoin(BTC) Drops Below 108,000 USDT with a 4.65% Decrease in 24 Hours
data.description: On Oct 30, 2025, 13:39 PM(UTC). According to Binance Market Data, Bitcoin has dropped below 108,000 USDT and is now trading at 107,762.15625 USDT, with a narrowed 4.65% decrease in 24 hours.

data.title: Garden Finance Faces Multi-Chain Theft of Over $5.5 Million
data.description: According to Odaily, Garden Finance has reportedly been targeted in a theft involving more than $5.5 million across multiple blockchain networks. An address linked to the Garden Finance team has communicated with the suspected attacker, offering a 10% white hat bounty. However, the team has yet to make a public statement regarding the incident. The address associated with the stolen funds is 0x98BCc6c34A489CEfdD9DfA8d792CFEFb02Ea2D12.

data.title: In the past hour, $157 million in positions were liquidated across the entire network, mainly long positions.
data.description: According to Coinglass data, $157 million in positions were liquidated across the network in the past hour, with $155 million in long positions and $2.348 million in short positions.

data.title: Canaan Inc. Secures Major Contract for Bitcoin Mining in Japan
data.description:
According to Odaily, Canaan Inc. has announced a significant contract in Japan, involving the deployment of its Avalon water-cooled Bitcoin mining machines. The contract, valued at 4.5MW, aims to facilitate real-time grid balancing and energy optimization.

The initiative is led by a major regional utility company, which plans to utilize Canaan's intelligent control chips to dynamically adjust voltage, frequency, and computing power. This approach is designed to stabilize the grid and enhance efficiency. The project is expected to be completed by the end of 2025.

data.title: Canaan Technology announced that it has signed a 4.5MW contract in Japan to deploy its Avalon water-cooled Bitcoin mining machines.
data.description: Bitcoin News reported on the X platform that Canaan Inc. announced a 4.5MW contract in Japan to deploy its Avalon water-cooled Bitcoin mining rigs for real-time grid balancing and energy optimization. Led by a large regional utility, the facility will use Canaan's smart control chips to dynamically adjust voltage, frequency, and hashrate to help stabilize the grid and improve efficiency. Completion is expected by the end of 2025.

data.description: U.S. stocks opened lower, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average down 0.5%, the S&P 500 down 0.5%, and the Nasdaq Composite down 0.7%. (Jinshi)

data.title: Zcash (ZEC) Needs 2,600% to Pass XRP: 'Easy,' Says Top Solana Developer
data.description:
Privacy coin Zcash (ZEC) trades at just $359, with a $5. 8 billion cap, but Solana's Mert insists a 2,600% run to flip XRP's $152 billion throne is not just possible but easy.
source: https://u.today/zcash-zec-needs-2600-to-pass-xrp-easy-says-top-solana-developer

data.title: A major whale's long positions in BTC, Trump, and ENA were liquidated three times within half an hour, turning a profit of $4 million into a loss of $238,000.
data.description: According to Lookonchain monitoring, due to the market decline, the highly leveraged whale "0xf35a6" had its long positions in BTC, Trump, and ENA liquidated three times within 30 minutes. The whale's unrealized profit of over $4 million has now turned into an unrealized loss of $238,000.

data.title: European Central Bank Maintains Deposit Rate at 2% Amid Market Expectations
data.description: According to PANews, the European Central Bank (ECB) has decided to keep the deposit facility rate unchanged at 2%, aligning with market expectations. This marks the third consecutive meeting where the ECB has opted not to alter the rate. Additionally, the main refinancing rate and the marginal lending rate remain steady at 2.15% and 2.40%, respectively.

data.title: Without Bitcoin, what happens to Ether and XRP?
data.description:
What if Bitcoin crashes? Will Ether and XRP fall with it or hold their ground? Discover how a BTC slump could rattle the entire crypto market.
source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/without-bitcoin-what-happens-to-ether-and-xrp?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.description:

source: https://cointelegraph.com/news/jpmorgan-tokenizes-private-equity-fund-kinexys-blockchain?utm_source=rss_feed&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=rss_partner_inbound

data.title: "Smart money that went long on ETH at 25x after the flash crash on October 11th" has added to its ETH long positions again, now valued at $64.66 million.
data.description: According to on-chain analyst Ai Yi, the "smart money" who went long on ETH 25x after the October 11 flash crash has added to his ETH long positions again after 8 days. In the past 15 minutes, he has added 2,621.95 ETH (approximately $9.96 million), and placed a limit buy order for 700 ETH in the [$3,804.8-$3,809.9] range, worth $2.66 million. He currently holds 16,380.08 ETH in long positions, approximately $62.35 million, with a floating profit of $1.58 million.

data.title: Smart Money Increases Ethereum Holdings Following Market Dip
data.description:
According to Odaily, on-chain analyst Ai Yi has observed a significant increase in Ethereum holdings by a trader known for making strategic moves. Following the market dip on October 11, this trader, who previously leveraged a 25x long position on Ethereum, has added to their holdings after an eight-day interval.

In the past 15 minutes, the trader has increased their Ethereum long position by 2,621.95 ETH, valued at approximately $9.96 million. Additionally, they have placed a limit order for 700 ETH within the price range of $3,804.8 to $3,809.9, worth $2.66 million.

Currently, the trader holds a total of 16,380.08 ETH in long positions, amounting to around $62.35 million, with an unrealized profit of $1.58 million.

data.title: The "whale with a 100% win rate since October 11th" has accumulated over $9.55 million in unrealized losses on its long positions in BTC, ETH, and SOL.
data.description: Hyperbot data shows that the "whale with a 100% win rate since October 11th" has accumulated a total unrealized loss of over $9.55 million on its long positions in BTC, ETH, and SOL (all pending orders have been filled). Specifically: ETH long positions, with a position value of $148 million, have an unrealized loss of $1.39 million; BTC long positions, with a position value of $111 million, have an unrealized loss of $1.86 million; and SOL long positions, with a position value of $104 million, have an unrealized loss of $6.31 million.
